analysis.key_quote: So, to wit, this new proposal will make it more difficult for all employees who fall under the Schedule Policy/Career to uphold and defend the Constitution.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the proposed rule undermining the ability of federal employees to uphold their constitutional duties, indicating opposition to the rule. It highlights potential conflicts with the Oath of Office and suggests that the rule prioritizes political loyalty over constitutional fidelity.
